document.full_text: discovery channel, home to a string of popular adventure and nature shows, will roll out a tv schedule next year featuring a circus family, woolly mammoths and reptile rescuers, among other oddities.
document.title: discovery banks on circus, swamp in new tv lineup
lines_and_colors: discovery channel, home to a string of popular adventure and nature shows, will roll out a tv schedule next year featuring a circus family, woolly mammoths and reptile rescuers, among other oddities.
